name: Cute Charm
summary: When hit by a contact move, the opponent has a 30% chance of becoming infatuated with the user, given that they are both opposite genders.
viability: This is not a very good ability. First of all, all the Pok√©mon that get Cute Charm have access to far better abilities. Second, even though 30% is pretty good, infatuation isn't a very reliable status condition. Third, you're also banking on the fact that the opponent will be a different gender, when that necessarily won't be the case. Don't run Cute Charm under any circumstance.
